insights.title: Steady Customer Growth
insights.description: Your customer base has grown by 12% this quarter compared to last quarter.

insights.title: Revenue Opportunity
insights.description: March's sales showed strong performance. Consider introducing a referral bonus program.

insights.title: Project Overload Warning
insights.description: Active projects have exceeded 10. Ensure enough resources are allocated to meet deadlines.

insights.title: Marketing Performance
insights.description: Social media campaigns generated 30% more leads this month than average.

insights.title: Retention Suggestion
insights.description: Customer churn rate increased by 3%. Introduce loyalty rewards to improve retention.

insights.title: Inventory Alert
insights.description: Two high-demand products are running low in stock. Restock immediately to avoid lost sales.
